price: Wͻn na wͻbɛdi adeε wͻ Aheman Firdaws no mu, na emu na wͻbεtena afe bͻͻ.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
